00027 #ifndef DICTIONARY_H
00028 #define DICTIONARY_H
00029 
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 #include "Basics.h"
00033 
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 class Dictionary {
00037 public:
00038     virtual void checkTriple(string *node) = 0;
00039     virtual unsigned int isClusterized(unsigned int id, unsigned int mode) = 0;
00040     virtual unsigned int retrieveID(string key, unsigned int mode) = 0;
00041     virtual string retrieveString(unsigned int id, unsigned int mode) = 0;
00042     virtual void updateID(unsigned int id, unsigned int new_id,
00043             unsigned int mode) = 0;
00044     virtual void beginClustering() = 0;
00045     virtual void endClustering() = 0;
00046     virtual void lexicographicSort(unsigned int mapping) = 0;
00047     virtual void split() = 0;
00048     virtual void write(string path, unsigned int separator) = 0;
00049     unsigned int getMaxID();
00050     unsigned int getMapping();
00051     unsigned int getNsubjects();
00052     unsigned int getNpredicates();
00053     unsigned int getNobjects();
00054     unsigned int getSsubobj();
00055     unsigned int getNLiterals();
00056     virtual void dumpStats(string &output) = 0;
00057 protected:
00058     unsigned int mapping;
00059     unsigned int nsubjects;
00060     unsigned int npredicates;
00061     unsigned int nobjects;
00062     unsigned int ssubobj;
00063     unsigned int nliterals;
00064     unsigned int nuris;
00065     unsigned int nblanks;
00066     virtual void initialize() = 0;
00067     virtual void map(unsigned int mapping) = 0;
00068 };
